msbt.message: I always get so totally nervous the morning of the fishing tourney!
If you maybe feel, like, a spiritual connection with a fish that you caught, you know what?It's maybe a good idea to take them home and keep them as a pet!
I'm going to spend the day enjoying the Fishing Tourney!<10_4 /> I'll even be happy if I don't catch anything.Because fish are gross.

I think luck is more important to fishing than skill.That's why, before fishing, I put on a lucky outfit and practice my "the one that got away" stories."It only got away because it snapped my line! We've got a sea monster in that river, folks!"
You want in on the Fishing Tourney? Go talk to C.J. He's over in the plaza, I think? Maybe. Probably?
